long_description: Versatility on and off pavement is at the core of the Cannondale Quick CX 3 bike, which offers a comfortable upright ride and a shock-absorbent fork to meet any path during urban commutes and tours. RST Neon Pro Custom suspension fork smooths out unexpected bumps; it supplies 50mm of travel and offers convenient lockout access. Aluminum frame offers an upright riding position that better enables you to scan the road ahead. Frame also uses Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology to damp road vibration for a smooth ride quality. 24-speed drivetrain with Shimano components offers up plenty of smooth-shifting gear combinations to power you up, over and down any terrain you may encounter. Cannondale hydraulic disc brakes deliver all-weather stopping power. Kenda Happy Medium tires have a fast-rolling center with aggressive outside lugs for cornering. Platform pedals makes this an accessible ride-just hop on and go; no special shoes required. Eyelets accept fenders or a rear rack (not included). Specs on the Cannondale Quick CX 3 bike are subject to change.
